text: MacCready is a Scottish version of the Gaelic surname McCready, McCreadie or McCredie. Notable people with the surname include: * Derek MacCready (born 1967), Canadian football league player * Paul MacCready (born 1925), American aerospace engineer and champion glider pilot ** 24643 MacCready, a Mars- crossing asteroid, named after Paul MacCready ==See also== * * Gwyn Cready (born 1962) U.S. author
title: MacCready
